channel.title: Michelin (1) on Gourmand Syndrome
channel.description: Recent content in Michelin (1) on Gourmand Syndrome

item.title: Stubborn Seed
item.description: For our trip to Miami, Florida, we booked a series of restaurants to try out. Our first restaurant was Stubborn Seed. This was highly rated by various Miami bloggers and food reviewers as a consistent Michelin dining restaurant. This restaurant also holds a Michelin Star for both dining and sustainability. It was quite easy to get a reservation a few weeks ahead of time, so we stopped by on a Wednesday evening at 5:30 PM.
